description:
In a dark world of monsters, adventurers and mages, some of the most gifted healers are subjugated to brute force even by the hands of their compatriots. But one mage, Keyaru, gains the ability to rewind time, turn the tables and right all wrongs.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

Note: This anime was aired at three broadcast censorship levels: a TV version, a streaming-exclusive "Redo" version, and an uncensored "Complete Healing" version, also translated as "Complete Recovery," shown on AT-X.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Sadism

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

tags.name: Nudity

tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gotoujio)__

Junji Gotou is a Japanese animator and character designer, who mainly does animation direction and key animation.

Her involvement in the game and anime Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, where she voiced the role of one of the heroines, Haruka Suzumiya and performed and penned the theme songs and other songs relating to the series, has brought her much attention. Her single "Precious Memories", used as the opening theme song for the series' animated version was a success; it had a peak ranking of 17th place on the Oricon charts and charted for 13 weeks.[1] She has since performed songs for other games and anime, including series such as Muv-Luv, Chrono Crusade, My-HiME, My-Otome, and School Days.    Kuribayashi has performed as part of the group Wild 3nin Musume, whose other present members are Joy Max (a.k.a. Joy Max Maximum) and Kisho Taniyama (a.k.a. Jackie Yang). She also once paired with Chiaki Takahashi to form the group exige, where Takahashi was known as CT. Veronica.(From Wiki)

ARCANA PROJECT is a 6-member girl's vocal unit jointly produces by Lantis and DEARSTAGE featuring tarot cards. Mia_REGINA directs songs and dances. 
They made their debut on January 18, 2020, followed by their first organized live "ACE of CUPS" named after minor arcana.

The outfits are based on common design with personalized detail.

Two of them have just joined to DS Gaming Team to appear at eSports contests as well.

They released their pre-debut single ACE of WANDS on March 25, 2020. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, all release events in March are canceled.

Currently they are performing occasionally at LINELIVE as a whole or part where membership is available instead of appearing at live house due to stayhome situation.

They have proudly announced that they will perform the opening theme for the Monster Girl Doctor Anime which will be airing on 2020 summer. They will release the song as their first single named カンパネラ響く空で(Campanella Hibiku Sora de)
A former Studio Easter employee. Debuted as an art director on [Guin Saga](https://anilist.co/anime/5041/).
